name: Touch 'N' Play Collection
description:
Touch 'N' Play Collection is a collection of 50 casual and classic board games split into four catagories: The included games are:
    Classic Games
  • Snakes & Ladders
  • Mahjong
  • Ludo
  • Checkers
  • Peg Solitaire
  • Dominoes
  • Yacht
  • Farkle
  • Pig
    Arcade
  • Breaker
  • Bubble Pop
  • Tanks
  • Grand Prix
  • Ant Invaders
  • Balloon Burst
  • Keepie Up
  • Duck Shoot
  • Target Shooting
  • Skiing
  • Ski Salom
  • Basketball Hoops
  • Bomber
  • Touch Galaxy
  • Volcano Defender
  • Avoidance
    Card Games
  • Touch Blackjack
  • Klondike
  • Free Cell
  • Tri Towers
  • Spider
  • Monte Carlo
  • Golf
  • Sir Tommy
  • Towers of Hanoi
  • Ace Up
  • Alhambra
  • Rummy
  • Whist
  • Chase The Ace
  • Hearts
    Puzzle Games
  • Touch Tet
  • Touch N Blast
  • Puzzle Blox
  • Simon
  • Jigsaw Puzzles
  • Matching Pairs
  • Sliding Puzzle
  • Eruption
  • Block Escape
  • Shape Scramble
genre: Action, Compilation, Puzzle, Racing / driving, Sports, Strategy / tactics
gamePlay: Arcade, Board game, Cards / tiles, Falling block puzzle, Paddle / Pong
